board: Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI)
interesting_facts: India is the only team to win an international match without hitting a single boundary
First team to switch from a white jersy to a yellow one in the middle of a World Cup
Bangladesh U-19 team once bowled out an entire team (Maldives) for just 6 runs in a T20 match
Holds the record of being the first-ever host nation to be eliminated early from the Champions Trophy
Afghanistan once won an ODI match where their top scorer was ‘Extras’
England is the ONLY team in cricket history to lose the final in all three major white-ball World Cup formats
New Zealand is the ONLY team in history to reach two consecutive ODI World Cup finals (2015 & 2019) and lose both
South Africa is the ONLY team in history to be eliminated from the World Cup due to a rain rule mistake
West Indies is the ONLY team to have won multiple World Cups but failed to qualify for both the ODI & T20 World Cups later
